translations: 人体的，身体的，躯体的；（与精神相对的）物质的，实体的
整个身体地，全身地；整个地，完全地；亲自地

sentences.sentence: He lifted her bodily into the air.
sentences.translation: 他把她整个人举到空中。

sentences.sentence: Detoxification will help keep your bodily systems running smoothly.
sentences.translation: 解毒会有助于保持你身体系统顺畅运行。

sentences.sentence: There are laws circumscribing the right of individual citizens to cause bodily harm to others.
sentences.translation: 限制公民对他人造成人身伤害的规定是有法可依的。
